TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebApplicationInformation extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供與健康事件關聯的資訊。

span.span: Provides information associated with health events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 健康監視，可讓生產環境和作業人員管理已部署的 Web 應用程式。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空間包含負責封裝應用程式健全狀況狀態資料和負責處理此資料提供者類型的健康情況事件型別。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它也會包含有助於管理健全狀況事件的支援型別。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 執行個體類別包含使用任何衍生自類型取得的資訊型別。Instances of the class contain information that is obtained using any of the types derived from the type. 您的應用程式需要存取受保護的資訊，此類型所提供的適當權限。Your application needs the appropriate permissions to access protected information provided by this type. 以下是組態檔，您可以使用包含應用程式資訊的記錄檔錯誤事件啟用 ASP.NET 的摘錄。The following is an excerpt of a configuration file you could use to enable ASP.NET to log error events that contain application information. ``` ``` > [!NOTE] > 在大部分情況下您將實作時，使用 ASP.NET 健康監視類型，您會指定中的值，以便控制健全狀況監視系統`healthMonitoring`組態區段。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 您也可以衍生自健全狀況監視的型別，來建立您自己的自訂事件和提供者。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 如需建立自訂的事件類別的範例，請參閱本主題中提供的範例。For an example of creating a custom event class, see the example provided in this topic. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例有兩個部分。The following code example has two parts. 第一個部分是組態檔可讓 ASP.NET 使用自訂事件的摘要。The first part is an excerpt of the configuration file that enables ASP.NET to use a custom event. 第二個示範如何建立自訂事件使用類別。The second shows how to create that custom event by using the class. 請確定您的自訂事件會引發在適當的時間，也就是會引發取代相等的系統健康狀態事件時。Ensure that your custom event is raised at the proper time, that is, when the equivalent system health event it replaces would be raised. ``` ``` [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebApplicationInformation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebApplicationInformation/CS/webapplicationinformation.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebApplicationInformation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebApplicationInformation/VB/webapplicationinformation.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void FormatToString(class System.Web.Management.WebEventFormatter formatter) cil managed

param.name: formatter
param.span: 包含用來將 Web 健康情況事件資訊格式化之定位和縮排設定的 。

span.span: The that contains the tab and indentation settings used to format the Web health event information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會提供統一的格式如事件資訊，這非常有用，如果事件資料必須記錄，並向使用者顯示更新版本。The method provides a uniform format for event information, which is useful if the event data must be logged and later presented to the user. 它在當提供者會叫用的其中一個會在內部呼叫方法。It is called internally when the provider invokes one of the methods. > [!NOTE] > 格式化時顯示您自訂事件的資訊，覆寫方法而非方法。When formatting your custom event information for display, override the method rather than the method. 這可避免覆寫或竄改機密的系統資訊。This will avoid overwriting or tampering with sensitive system information. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定自訂資訊的格式。The following code example shows how to format custom information. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebApplicationInformation#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebApplicationInformation/CS/webapplicationinformation.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebApplicationInformation#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebApplicationInformation/VB/webapplicationinformation.vb#9)]

summary.span: 針對顯示用途，格式化事件資訊。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法，藉由呼叫格式化事件資訊方法。The method formats event information by calling the method. > [!NOTE] > 格式化時顯示您自訂事件的資訊，覆寫方法，而這方法。When formatting your custom event information for display, override the method rather than this method. 這可避免覆寫或竄改機密的系統資訊。This will avoid overwriting or tampering with sensitive system information. ## Examples 如需使用的範例方法，請參閱。For an example of using the method, see .
